item.title: first post
item.description: hello this is the first post on this blog, april 14 2024. ive just destroyed some pour soul’s hugo css to make this the point of this site is to post takes/thoughts. there are some philosophical reasons to having your own blog and expressing your views online. i think it would be cool if unknown strangers found this mysterious webpage and agreed with some of the future posts the goal is to go as MINIMAL AS POSSIBLE.
